title: The Judy Cast Look Just Like Their Real-Life Counterparts
text:
Of taking on the role of Judy Garland in Judy, Renée Zellweger told Town & Country, "It was going to have to come from a different place." She added, "Her talent is for the ages. Her humanity is to be emulated."

Judging by the already-escalating Oscar buzz around her performance, Zellweger made it happen—but she and her fellow cast mates also owe something to the talented individuals behind the movie's hair, makeup, and costumes. When taking on real people, the actors have to resemble their inspirations in addition to channeling them—and in this film, the resemblance is almost uncanny. Take a look at how the cast of the Judy Garland biopic measures up to the real people they're based on.
